descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][/size][size=6][/size][/center][center][size=6]Descrição PT-BR - Leia o texto completo para não haver erros.[/size]
[size=5]Raça Lobisomem[/size]

[size=4]Sempre quis jogar com Lobisomem sem precisar completar quest's, eu sempre quis ser um animal por Skyrim
Então decidi colocar a Raça do Lobisomem para ser escolhida
Na raça de Lobisomem, você [color=#ff0000]n[/color][color=#ff0000]ão[/color] pode: Usar armas ou armaduras, Não pode regenerar HP em combate, Não pode falar com NPC'S.
De inicio, Escolha um raça qualquer para completar a primeira quest ([color=#ff0000]Libertaç[/color][color=#ff0000]ão[/color])[/size]
[size=4]Quando a quest estiver completa, use o comando [/size][color=#ff0000][size=4]SHOWRACEMENU[/size][/color][size=4] e escolha o Lobisomem.

Mod's para incrementar ainda mais a raça LOBISOMEM
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34770/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34770/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34770/]Extra Werewolf Perks[/url] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12687/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12687/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12687/?]Tales of Lycanthropy[/url] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13779/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13779/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13779/?]Heart of the Beast[/url]
[color=#00ff00]Mods to further enhance the race WEREWOLF

[/color]Use este mod para equipar alguns shout's na Raça lobisomem
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72238]Souls Quick Menu[/url]
[color=#00ff00]Use this mod to equip some shouts in the werewolf Race[/color]
[/size]


[color=#00ff00][size=6]Description ENG - Read the full text to be no mistakes.
[/size][size=5]Werewolf Beast Race
[/size]
[/color][size=4][color=#00ff00]Always wanted to play with Werewolf without completing quests, I always wanted to be an animal by Skyrim
So I decided to put the werewolf race to be chosen
In werewolf race, you[/color] [color=#ff0000]can't [/color][color=#00ff00]: Use weapons and armor, can not regenerate HP in combat, can't talk to NPC'S.
Initially, Select any race to complete the first quest ([/color][color=#ff0000]Liberation[/color][color=#00ff00])
When the quest is complete, use the[/color] [color=#ff0000]SHOWRACEMENU [/color][color=#00ff00]command and choose the Werewolf.[/color]
[/size][size=4][/size][size=4][/size][/center]
author: Darkmano
